alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 12:53PM PST until March 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...In the Eastern Sierra, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. In the Owens Valley, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Particularly hazardous travel conditions are possible on Highway 395 due to strong crosswinds. Blowovers of high profile vehicles are possible. Winds will decrease on Saturday night, then increase again on Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
